com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.phase

Class AbstractPhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.phase.AbstractPhase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Phase, Tickable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DummyPhase, EditModePhase, LobbyPhase, TimedPhase

    public abstract class AbstractPhase
extends java.lang.Object
implements Phase
    Simple implementation of a Phase. Implements the necessary Feature-handling.
